name: Fusion Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just come back from a fantastic long weekend break at the Fusion Suites and cannot rate this beautiful, relaxing, classy, boutique hotel more highly. Alex and Shamila welcome you into a peaceful and homely setting and offer a flexibility of service that you won't find anywhere else. Our room was simply stunning and a great size. Breakfast was a cosy affair in the kitchen and served in a welcoming, unobtrusive manner. Both check-in and check-out were based around our times and there was no hint that we may be inconveniencing anyone by leaving at 5p.m.
reviews.title: Fantastic, relaxing stay

likes.liked: — The quality and cleanliness of the accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel's location is superbly set, near to the Van Gogh museum and two roads down from "the" shopping street in Amsterdam. If you a hire a bike from the many bike hire shops around the city a long weekend is certainly enough time to take in the many sites and sounds of such a diverse and cultural place.
reviews.title: Absolutely Brilliant

reviews.text: We would highly recommend a stay in this hotel in order to set you up for a fantastic exploration around such a beautiful city; a trip to the Fusion Suites and Amsterdam is a must!
reviews.title: Beautiful place, perfect location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a short stay at Fusion Suite Number 40. Alex and Sharmila are perfect hosts and made our stay something special. The room was beautiful and the Sabon fragrance so wonderful I took some home! I would definately recommend it to anyone looking for something different from the general run of the mill hotel.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place is better than a hotel, its expensive but what isn't if you want to stay somewhere nice! The design of the whole place is beautiful, the hosts are friendly and helpful. The location is great, away from all the noise but still only a 5minute walk from the centre of town. Vondel Park is across the road, and you can take a tram everywhere. Stay here, stop looking!
reviews.title: This place is fantastic!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are big and nicely decorated, and this is a different experience than the typical hotel. Sharmila and her husband had great recommendations for a reastaurant the first night (Chang - i, I believe), all in all they were extremely helpful.
reviews.title: Not a hotel

likes.liked: — The size and decoration of rooms
likes.disliked: — The lack of privacy and anonymity

reviews.title: What a wonderful time!!!!
reviews.text: When reading the reviews here on this page I think it must be stressed that the Fusion Suites is not a hotel, it is rooms let out in someones home. The walls between our room and the next were paperthin, and personally I think I prefer to stay in larger hotels. We had breakfast in the kitchen, a breakfast that was very nice, but it felt akward to sit in someones kitchen, and also the room wasnt very big, so we would have had to share the table with other guests if they came down at the same time. Also I think the rooms were a bit pricey, considering it is more a luxurious hostel than a hotel.

reviews.title: FusionHeaven
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at the Fusion Suites! Beautiful place lovely hosts, great breakfast made to order. You will miss out on a wonderful stay if you don't choose this B&B!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What makes this a fantastic place to stay is the warmth and genuineness of the hosts. Nothing is too much trouble. Sharmilla deserves special mention. We had been on the road and wanted a close by good meal. She discussed the alternatives, made the booking. Always thinking about thier guests. Subject to budget go for the suites they are fab and are worth it. Also the minibar. i.e non- alcoholic drinks are free and the wireless system works well. The breakfast is a highlight, food is great, conversation is simulating and there is something to be said for sitting in the kitchen of a HOME having a cup of tea or coffee having your food cooked to order.
reviews.title: Loved it - couldnt have been better

reviews.text: If you are tired of another same old hotel room then this is the place to stay. The breakfast was worth the stay by itself, it is convient to all attractions and a great base to explore this beautiful city. I don't normally rate hotels but felt that fellow travelers need to know about Fusion Suites 40.
reviews.title: Home away from Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just got back from our trip. We stayed in Fusion Suites Number40 for two nights in room 103.
reviews.title: wonderful of everything!

reviews.text: The room is so beautiful and well thought arranged. Feels like home. Service was great! We loved breakfast very much!
reviews.title: Charming Stay in Amsterdam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I highly recommend this hotel if you are going to visit Amsterdam.
reviews.title: Incomparable Hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our stay with Sharmila and Alex was absolutely lovely. The room was beautiful and quite comfortable. The bathroom was absolutely fantastic. Great care was taken with the decorating of the entire hotel. And many needs were anticipated.
reviews.title: We LOVE Fusion Suites Number 40!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I too, as other have done, have to stress that this is not a Hotel but someone's house and the floors are paper thin and you can hear every footstep which kept me awake both nights. The room was lovely but I have stayed in better for the same money and our bathroom was tired and worn (the shower door was even cracked). Alex and Sharmila were lovely and very helpful but after we got charged for the bottle of champagne we were told in our room was for our wedding anniversary I left very disappointed. I emailed them afterwards to explain that we thought the bottle was complementary but I didn't get a reply. This review is not 'sour grapes' but an honest point of view for others who might feel the same way I do.
reviews.title: Not what I expected
PERFECT- STAY HERE IF YOU CAN AFFORD IT!
reviews.text: I cannot say too much more than all of the other RAVE reviews on this site. I will add that this place really is #1 for a reason. It is an experiential place to stay, and you are truly right in the middle of everything that you could possibly want to do.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I took a tour of Europe staying at lots of 5 star hotels, and I will add that this place took the prize. You WILL NOT find a better place to stay. Go here and enjoy, I had the time of my life.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Fusion Suites for 3 nights over New Year. I can honestly say that without a doubt, this is the nicest hotel I have ever stayed in! We have travelled quite a bit and stayed in some fantastic hotels across the world but I have never come across any thing quite like this.
reviews.title: Fantasic place - Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in room number 1. ( Grand Suite ) The room was decorated very luxuriously with a fabulous four poster bed. The attention to detail was unbelievable! The room had tea and coffee making facilities, free mini bar and free internet access. On our second night we came back to a complimentary bottle of champagne... a lovely touch! ( The fresh flowers throughout the rooms were beautiful also)
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B!!!

likes.liked: — The hosts are extremely helpful and will do whatever they can to help make your stay pleasant.

description: Welcome to Fusion Suites, your luxury boutique hotel, situated in the best possible location in Amsterdam. Comfort, luxury, privacy and personal attention complement your beautifully appointed large suite. With only 4 suites available you will truly feel as our guest.
